sentences.en: A gala dinner was held to celebrate the world premiere of the film.
sentences.cn: 为庆祝该电影在全球范围的首映举行了欢庆宴.

sentences.en: A Grand Feast , Silver Christmas Gala Dinner Startup for You!
sentences.cn: 欢乐圣诞,一场盛大的庆典, 圣诞夜欢乐引擎为您启动!

sentences.en: All the programs on CCTV Spring Festival Gala are very wonderful.
sentences.cn: 春晚)里的节目都特别的精彩.

sentences.en: Certainly, last night's gala was a reminder of bull markets of yesteryear.
sentences.cn: 的确, 昨夜的庆祝让我们想起了前些年的牛市.
圣诞节是个喜庆的日子.
人人都穿着节日的盛装.

sentences.en: First was his chance meeting with Gala luard in 1929 in Cadaqu é s.
sentences.cn: 首先是他与加拉·艾吕雅在卡达克斯的偶然相遇.

sentences.en: Gala Television Corporation runs three commercial television channels and produces video programs.
sentences.cn: 八大电视股份有限公司,经营三大频道以及影音节目制作与相关业务.

sentences.en: Paris , 1960 ca . Sophia Loren and Maurice Chevalier at a Gala Dinner.
sentences.cn: 1960年, 索菲娅·罗兰 与墨利斯·雪佛莱参加晚宴.

sentences.en: People always enjoy the lighted lanterns and the gala performances.
sentences.cn: 人们都很喜欢这些点亮的灯笼和欢庆的表演.

sentences.en: The carbohydrate portion is made of gala ctose, glucosamine, fucose and sialic acid.
sentences.cn: 碳水化合物部分由半乳糖,葡糖胺, 岩藻糖和唾液酸组成.

sentences.en: The gala culminated in a firework display.
The gala evening was attended by royalty and politicians.
sentences.cn: 王室成员和政坛要人参加了这个晚会。

sentences.en: The invitation to the gala performance is marked ` black tie.'
sentences.cn: 观看特别演出的请柬上注有"请戴黑领结"字样.

sentences.en: The Queen attended a gala concert at the Royal Festival Hall.
sentences.cn: 女王出席了在皇家音乐厅举行的音乐盛会.

words.tran_cn: 祝贺，庆祝；节日，特别娱乐
